meta.author: o3
meta.description: Estate-FlexHM ACTIVE until 2025-08-31; Annual-Main v12 PENDING (start 2025-09-01). Adds session_kcal_targets, ramp_up_barbell, WOD matrix (Mon-Thu-Fri A-B-A), selection rules and timeline.

selection_rules.phase: Use training_phase with status:'active' whose date range includes today. If none, use the last phase with status:'active'. 'pending' phases are ignored until manually activated.

training_phases.name: Estate-FlexHM
training_phases.notes: DB/KB only; vietati carry lineari; rotazione Metcon A-B-A; warm-up dedicati per ogni blocco.

ramp_up_barbell.notes: W1-2 @~70%; W3 75-80% + DL 3x5@60-65%; W4 deload 60% speed/pulls

weekly_structure.Mon: Clean & Jerk + Squat + Complementare + WOD + Rifinitura
weekly_structure.Tue: Ginnastica avanzata + Complementare forza upper + WOD tecnico
weekly_structure.Fri: Ginnastica tecnica + Richiamo forza + Hero/Metcon tecnico

workflow_rules.file_logic: Always read recovery_log and session_log; fail if missing mandatory fields.
workflow_rules.deload_logic: Default deload every 4th week; ask user to advance/delay by ±1 week.
workflow_rules.variety: Avoid repeating same strength pattern or MetCon format within 3 sessions.

changelog.author: o3
changelog.summary: Added explicit phases with status (Estate active, Annual‑Main pending), kcal targets, WOD rotation A‑B‑A (Mon‑Thu‑Fri), ramp‑up barbell and selection rules.
